# isBrowsingVersions

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the document is currently displaying the Versions browser.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isBrowsingVersions: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the versions browser is visible.

## Browsing Document Versions

- **browseVersions(_:)**: Opens the Versions browser in the document’s main window.
- **stopBrowsingVersions(completionHandler:)**: Dismiss the Versions browser for the current document.
